betas = np.linspace(0.0, 0.5, 15)
enhLayer = 2
enhZ = 0.0
Ly = 0.001
pwr = 0.01
w0 = 0.0005
waveParams = {'waveType': waveType, 'pwr': pwr, 'w0': w0, 'Ly': Ly,
    'nPointsInteg': 300, 'dynamicMaxXCoef': 10.0}
tmm.SetParams(pol=pol)
tmm.wave.SetParams(**waveParams)
tmm.I0 = pwr / (w0 * Ly)
sr = tmm.Sweep('beta', betas, layerNr=enhLayer, layerZ=enhZ, outEnh=True)
srW = tmm.WaveSweep('beta', betas, layerNr=enhLayer, layerZ=enhZ, outEnh=True)
pwrIncident = sr.Ii * srW.beamArea
np.testing.assert_allclose(srW.Pi, pwrIncident, atol=0.0001)
np.testing.assert_allclose(srW.Pr / srW.Pi, sr.Ir / sr.Ii, atol=0.0001)
np.testing.assert_allclose(srW.Pt / srW.Pi, sr.It / sr.Ii, atol=0.0001)
np.testing.assert_allclose(srW.enh, sr.enh, atol=0.0005)
